text:
Be careful. I have W2K12 with an extended support agreement. I also have a
fully supported version of MECM running on it. Microsoft is now saying that
they will not provide support for MECM even though it is fully supported AND
there is a valid extended support agreement on W2K12

metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] Extended Security Updates for Server 2012R2
metadata.email_text_original:
You don't often get email from richmckinney6@gmail.com. Learn why this is
important [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification] 
Be careful.  I have W2K12 with an extended support agreement.  I also have a
fully supported version of MECM running on it.  Microsoft is now saying that
they will not provide support for MECM even though it is fully supported AND
there is a valid extended support agreement on W2K12 
On Mon, Feb 5, 2024 at 10:31 AM Mark Henry <mhenry609@gmail.com
Link: https://groups.google.com/d/msgid/patchmanagement/CA%2BQ1Oiuf_bmp94N3P5X8gtm52y_vRu5Cp0iKAg17u2bwc%2Bz9jQ%40mail.gmail.com
